name: Introduction to Quantitative Methods in Sociology
description: Introduction in quantitative social science research from descriptive statistics to hypothesis testing using various strategies for the analysis of bivariate relationships.
exclusions: SOC200Y5, SOC222H5, ECO220Y1,ECO227Y1, GGR270H1, PSY201H1, STA220H1, STA248H1, POL232H1, POL242Y1, POL322H1
